full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023 Family Composition Affidavit 9 I, Tak Cheong LEE, of 10-C Castle Court(Housing Project), Boston, Mass. 02118 declare under oath: that I was born in Toyshun, Canton, China of Lee Wan Young(father) and NG Show Yen, on Feb. 24, 2907; my parents are deceased; father thes died In Vancouver, D.C., Canada before I came to this c country in 1955.I do not know the date of his death; my mother died in Toyshun, Canton, China about 1960,after I cane to U.S. to believe my father died in 1944.b I am not sure; Icame to U.S from Hong Kong, B.C.C. Y-12, Oct .1, 1955 at SanFrancisco, Caloo file A10 517 306; were that in our family there three children; I have this date filed visa petitions for my two married sisters: Lam. Lg Yuet 01 (nee L1,Yuet 01) who was born April 8,1922; she is married to Lam, Chiu Yin, who was born in China 10/29/20: that have three children: Lam.Woon "ing (m), 1945: FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) all were born in China and reside in Hong Kong, B.C.C. My sisters(2) were born in the same place as I, Toyshun, "anton,China: my other married sister is NG;Lee Chun 01 (nee Lee, Chun 01 ) born May 40 1927: she is married to NG,Sze Kui, born KE in China Sept. 8,1923; they have a FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) in Chima;they live an Hong Kong, R.C.C.: I came to Hong Kong, BCC in 1949 from mainland China and that is when I last saw my two sisters: they were already married; do then came to U.S.in 1955 and I haveletters from hemdated 1962; had other letters from them from Hong hong but my wife throw them away; I have my two sisters' family photographs. ssy own wife and three children came from Hong Kong,Bec in 1962; when I sent my wife money and support when they were there, and she would help my married sisters;however now they arrived as residents and I have not sent them funds; I wish to make these statement to support my visa petitions P.O my two married sisters as I have no other evidence. Tak heong Lee Sworn to before mo, this 19th of May 1971 Carolyn ., NotaryPublic comm. xpires 12/7/73 :03 Note: and wife is choi, Pong LES, arrived 12/27/62 at Anohorage,Alaska,A13 144 2 she was born 12/23/10;my daughter is Chin, Dik Sim FOIA (b) (6) born 5/20/37, ad Justed 2-2, Feb. 11, 1965, FOIA (b)(6) another FOIA (b)(6 FOIA (b)(6) all were born in China iy son, dward Yinbong LEE was naturalized U.S.District 12/23/69 cert.9102749 fte pot. 373071-- he arrived with my wife, 12/29/62, born Mar.2, 1947 in China. Two letters to me from Hong Kong, BCC attached, also.
